data.text:
――This year, once again, there have been many unforgettable races, 
and many new legends were created.
data.name: MC
data.processed:
<story>――This year, once again, there have been many unforgettable races, 
<story>and many new legends were created.

data.text:
This time, we'll be rewarding the Uma Musume that has won the 
most Majors with a brand new Racing Uniform.
data.name: MC
data.processed:
<story>This time, we'll be rewarding the Uma Musume that has won the 
<story>most Majors with a brand new Racing Uniform.

data.text:
Well then, thank you for waiting. 
We'll now begin the URA Awards ceremony.
data.name: MC
data.processed:
<story>Well then, thank you for waiting. 
<story>We'll now begin the URA Awards ceremony.

data.text:
Alright, let's get this party started by 
blowing the lid off this boring venue.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Alright, let's get this party started by 
<story>blowing the lid off this boring venue.

data.text: Don't you dare! This is supposed to be a stately event!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Don't you dare! This is supposed to be a stately event!

data.text:
Fufuu, but I do understand the feeling 
of wanting to liven things up.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, but I do understand the feeling 
<story>of wanting to liven things up.

data.text:
Normally, we're always being praised by the 
loud cheers from the stands, after all.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Normally, we're always being praised by the 
<story>loud cheers from the stands, after all.

data.text:
Yeah, yeah! Uoooooh～ it's so moviiiing～!! 
……when the stands are overflowing with that kind of cheering!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, yeah! Uoooooh～ it's so moviiiing～!! 
<story>……when the stands are overflowing with that kind of cheering!

data.text: Really, Spe has received a lot of those kinds of cheers so far.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Really, Spe has received a lot of those kinds of cheers so far.

data.text: Really, Spe has received a lot of those kinds of cheers so far.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Really, Spe has received a lot of those kinds of cheers so far.

data.text: Even now, it's still a mysterious feeling――
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Even now, it's still a mysterious feeling――

data.text:
She came all the way from Hokkaido, and even gets 
lost within the academy. She should be someone 
you just can't leave on their own but……
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>She came all the way from Hokkaido, and even gets 
<story>lost within the academy. She should be someone 
<story>you just can't leave on their own but……

data.text:
It seems like everything happened so fast but, 
thinking back on it, quite a lot has happened, hasn't it?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>It seems like everything happened so fast but, 
<story>thinking back on it, quite a lot has happened, hasn't it?

data.text:
And now, moving on to the announcement. The Uma Musume that 
showed us many big achievements, and contributed greatly――
data.name: MC
data.processed:
<story>And now, moving on to the announcement. The Uma Musume that 
<story>showed us many big achievements, and contributed greatly――

data.text: From Team <Sirius>, Special Week-san!
data.name: MC
data.processed: <story>From Team <Sirius>, Special Week-san!

data.text: I'm S-S-S-Special Week!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I'm S-S-S-Special Week!!

data.text:
Congratulations on your victories. 
Please tell us your thoughts.
data.name: MC
data.processed:
<story>Congratulations on your victories. 
<story>Please tell us your thoughts.

data.text: Y-yes! It's an honor to receive this prestigious award……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Y-yes! It's an honor to receive this prestigious award……!

data.text: She's so stiff, isn't she……?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>She's so stiff, isn't she……?

data.text: Fufuu……
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Fufuu……

data.text:
Suu～……haa～…… 
Um…… well, you see……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Suu～……haa～…… 
<story>Um…… well, you see……

data.text:
……the reason I was able to make it to this point, 
truly took many things, each of these was incredibly important.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>……the reason I was able to make it to this point, 
<story>truly took many things, each of these was incredibly important.

data.text:
It started with the dream left to me by both of my moms, 
and running together with all my friends―― my rivals……
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>It started with the dream left to me by both of my moms, 
<story>and running together with all my friends―― my rivals……

data.text:
It wasn't just a simple path. There were hills, 
and times when things got rough, truly there was a lot.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>It wasn't just a simple path. There were hills, 
<story>and times when things got rough, truly there was a lot.

data.text:
But, all that time, Trainer-san was there to support me. 
Showing me the path I needed to take.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>But, all that time, Trainer-san was there to support me. 
<story>Showing me the path I needed to take.

data.text:
By doing that, I was able to face each hurdle one by one, 
because of that, I'm here now.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>By doing that, I was able to face each hurdle one by one, 
<story>because of that, I'm here now.

data.text:
Moving forward, I have no idea how far 
I can go to fulfill everyone's dreams, but――
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Moving forward, I have no idea how far 
<story>I can go to fulfill everyone's dreams, but――

data.text:
To show people many dreams, even those that seem out of reach, 
that's the kind of Uma Musume I will continue to run as!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>To show people many dreams, even those that seem out of reach, 
<story>that's the kind of Uma Musume I will continue to run as!

data.text:
……rather than nervousness, maybe I'm 
excited and looking forward to it.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……rather than nervousness, maybe I'm 
<story>excited and looking forward to it.

data.text:
I feel the same, I've wanted to run 
together with everyone after all……!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I feel the same, I've wanted to run 
<story>together with everyone after all……!

data.text:
The battle we've all been waiting for…… 
so that we'll have no regrets, we'll run with all we've got.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>The battle we've all been waiting for…… 
<story>so that we'll have no regrets, we'll run with all we've got.

data.text: Yeah! With everyone doing their best, a serious competition!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>Yeah! With everyone doing their best, a serious competition!

data.text:
As Japan's #1, I'll be running while 
shouldering everyone's dreams!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>As Japan's #1, I'll be running while 
<story>shouldering everyone's dreams!
